title: Pimiento-ish Cheese
ingredients: 1cup labneh, sour cream, or plain whole-milk Greek yogurt
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
Pita chips, crusty bread, breadsticks, cucumber spears, and/or sliced radishes, for serving
directions: 1. In a medium bowl, stir together 1 cup labneh and 1 tablespoon harissa paste.
2. Finely grate 1 garlic clove into the dip.
3. Drain and finely chop 12 pickled Peppadew peppers; add to the bowl.
4. Using the medium holes of a box grater, grate 8 ounces extra-sharp cheddar cheese (about 2 cups) and add it to the dip.
5. Stir everything to combine, then season to taste with salt and black pepper.
6. Transfer to a small serving bowl and drizzle with olive oil.
7. Serve with pita chips, crusty bread, breadsticks, cucumber spears, sliced radishes, or any of your favorite dippers.
